response.overview: Time Hoppers follows the adventures of four gifted children from Vancouverâ€™s Aqli Academy in the year 2050. When Abdullah, Aysha, Khalid and Layla stumble upon the ability to time travel, they are thrust into an adventure along the historic Silk Road to save the great scientists of that era from an evil time travelling alchemist named Fasid. Will the Time Hoppers be able to save the foundations of modern science and safely return home?
response.title: Time Hoppers - The Silk Road
